thread.section_title: Fenerbahce encouraged to bid for Mesut Ozil with Arsenal star attracting only mild interest – Metro
thread.title: Fenerbahce encouraged to bid for Mesut Ozil with Arsenal star attracting only mild interest
thread.title_full: Fenerbahce encouraged to bid for Mesut Ozil with Arsenal star attracting only mild interest

author: Coral Barry
title: Fenerbahce encouraged to bid for Mesut Ozil with Arsenal star attracting only mild interest
text:
Mesut Ozil is edging towards the exit at Arsenal (Picture: Getty) Fenerbahce are set to launch an audacious summer bid for Mesut Ozil after becoming encouraged by the lack of sides interested in signing the Arsenal side.
Brandt, Weigl and the Germany players PL bosses will be watching v England The attacker is believed to have been put up for sale by Arsene Wenger with the Frenchman coming round to the idea of selling off his two biggest stars this summer.
Reports claim Wenger is set to stay at Arsenal beyond the summer and Ozil is likely to be given the chop after refusing to sign a new contract at the club.
Ozil cost Arsenal £42 million when he arrived from Real Madrid four years ago and has been consistently one of the club’s top performers.
Arsenal fixtures Manchester City (H) – Sun 2 Apr
West Ham (H) – Wed 5 Apr
Crystal Palace (A) – Mon 10 Apr
Middlesbrough (A) – Mon 17 apr
Manchester City (N) FA Cup – Sun 23 Apr
Tottenham (A) – Sun 30 Apr
Manchester United (H) – Sat 6 May
Stoke (A) – Sat 13 May
Ozil has struggled with his fitness and health in the last few weeks (Picture: Getty) But his displays this season and refusal to pen a new deal has made him a target for criticism from fans and pundits alike.
The Mirror claim Fenerbahce have been watching Ozil’s situation closely and believe they have a chance in tempting the Germany star to Turkey this summer.
Alexis Sanchez is another Gunner looking like he will leave the club (Picture: Getty) More: Football Time for a reality check: Arsenal is as good as it's going to get for Mesut Ozil 
Man Utd to face Man City, Barcelona AND Real Madrid in action-packed summer 
Jose Mourinho wants Chelsea star and Tottenham ace with £25m release clause at Man Utd 
Fenerbahce is already home to one former Gunner, Robin van Persie and the Turkisk giants want Ozil to come in as a replacement for the Dutchman.
Ozil’s wage demands and transfer fee have scared off potential suitors with the Germany international struggling with his fitness and form this season.
Real Madrid have been mentioned as a possible destination, but with no frontrunners in the frame, Fenerbahce are confident they can do a deal.
MORE: Arsenal put Alexis Sanchez and Mesut Ozil up for sale
